original_text:
You will be like one who lies down in the midst of the sea,
    like one who lies on the top of a mast.
korean_text: 너는 바다 가운데에 누운 자 같을 것이요 돛대 위에 누운 자 같을 것이며

sentences.original_text: You will be like one who lies down in the midst of the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 바다 한가운데에 누워 있는 사람처럼 되리라

sentences.original_text: like one who lies on the top of a mast
